verses.t: I will extol{H7311} thee, my God{H430}, O king{H4428}; and I will bless{H1288} thy name{H8034} for ever{H5769} and ever{H5703}.
Every day{H3117} will I bless{H1288} thee; and I will praise{H1984} thy name{H8034} for ever{H5769} and ever{H5703}.
Great{H1419} is Lordthe {H3068}, and greatly{H3966} to be praised{H1984}; and his greatness{H1420} is unsearchable{H2714}.and his…: Heb. and of his greatness there is no search
One{H1755} generation{H1755} shall praise{H7623} thy works{H4639} to another, and shall declare{H5046} thy mighty acts{H1369}.
I will speak{H7878} of the glorious{H3519} honour{H1926} of thy majesty{H1935}, and of thy wondrous{H6381} works{H1697}.works: Heb. things, or, words
And men shall speak{H559} of the might{H5807} of thy terrible acts{H3372}: and I will declare{H5608} thy greatness{H1420}.declare: Heb. declare it
They shall abundantly utter{H5042} the memory{H2143} of thy great{H7227} goodness{H2898}, and shall sing{H7442} of thy righteousness{H6666}.
LordThe {H3068} is gracious{H2587}, and full of compassion{H7349}; slow{H750} to anger{H639}, and of great{H1419} mercy{H2617}.of great…: Heb. great in mercy
LordThe {H3068} is good{H2896} to all: and his tender mercies{H7356} are over all his works{H4639}.
All thy works{H4639} shall praise{H3034} Lordthee, O {H3068}; and thy saints{H2623} shall bless{H1288} thee.
They shall speak{H559} of the glory{H3519} of thy kingdom{H4438}, and talk{H1696} of thy power{H1369};
To make known{H3045} to the sons{H1121} of men{H120} his mighty acts{H1369}, and the glorious{H3519} majesty{H1926} of his kingdom{H4438}.
Thy kingdom{H4438} is an everlasting{H5769} kingdom{H4438}, and thy dominion{H4475} endureth throughout all{H1755} generations{H1755}.an…: Heb. a kingdom of all ages
LordThe {H3068} upholdeth{H5564} all that fall{H5307}, and raiseth up{H2210} all those that be bowed down{H3721}.
The eyes{H5869} of all wait{H7663} upon thee; and thou givest{H5414} them their meat{H400} in due season{H6256}.wait…: or, look unto
Thou openest{H6605} thine hand{H3027}, and satisfiest{H7646} the desire{H7522} of every living thing{H2416}.
LordThe {H3068} is righteous{H6662} in all his ways{H1870}, and holy{H2623} in all his works{H4639}.holy: or, merciful, or, bountiful
LordThe {H3068} is nigh{H7138} unto all them that call{H7121} upon him, to all that call{H7121} upon him in truth{H571}.
He will fulfil{H6213} the desire{H7522} of them that fear{H3373} him: he also will hear{H8085} their cry{H7775}, and will save{H3467} them.
LordThe {H3068} preserveth{H8104} all them that love{H157} him: but all the wicked{H7563} will he destroy{H8045}.
My mouth{H6310} shall speak{H1696} the praise{H8416} Lordof the {H3068}: and let all flesh{H1320} bless{H1288} his holy{H6944} name{H8034} for ever{H5769} and ever{H5703}.
